name: W Potrzasku
overview: W Potrzasku is a science fiction game.The protagonist of the game awakens in a cocoon together with another man. After a brief conversation the humanoid alien enters the room and takes a companion to carry on the experiments. On the floor lies a steel plate, the output from the room is blocked by the laser barrier. The objective of the game is to escape from the alien base. The underground base is full of traps, closed doors, hostile mechanised units and useful items, that should be used in appropriate places. Entering all of the doors requires using a proper access card. Encountered enemies may be killed with a pistol or appropriate use of electric fields. The energy level may be supplemented by drinking fresh water, what requires finding a bottle and fresh water supply. The game screen is divided into labyrinth view and action panel. The game is presented in first person perspective, with rendered animated graphics. The control is done with the mouse by using the direction arrows or one of the action icons (use, describe, inventory).
